projects.name: InvestWise Predictor
projects.description: Intelligent online tool utilizing neural networks to predict investment opportunities across Kenya's regions. Analyzes economic data, infrastructure, and market trends to recommend optimal investment locations.
projects.impact: Helping investors make data-driven regional investment decisions

projects.name: AI-Driven Plant Disease Detection
projects.description: Advanced plant disease detection system using image processing and machine learning for early disease identification in crops

projects.name: Electricity Theft Detection Framework
projects.description: Machine learning framework for detecting electricity theft in Kenya's power grid through smart meter analytics. Active Master's thesis research.

projects.name: GDP Growth Prediction Model
projects.description: ML model predicting annual GDP growth using economic indicators and time series analysis

projects.name: Healthcare Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Comprehensive dashboard for patient data visualization and predictive analytics at Kingdom Hospital

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Collaborative filtering recommendation engine using movie ratings data

projects.name: Time Series Analysis Suite
projects.description: Comprehensive time series forecasting toolkit for economic and business data
